InstallPrompt: Do you want to run the automatic install right now?
InstallPromptBody: If you don't run it now you'll have to either run it later or set the server up manually
Name: Server Name
NameInvalid: The server name cannot be empty or contain special characters
NoSettings: This server does not have any settings you can change
ConfirmDelete: Do you really want to delete this server? (this cannot be undone)
NoUsers: This server does not have any associated users
EnvironmentEditHint: Changes to these settings will only apply after reloading the server definition
CreateMissingPermissions: Não tens permissão para ver os nós ou modelos, que são necessários para criar servidores. Contacta o teu administrador

flags.autoStart: Iniciar o servidor quando o nó inicia
flags.autoRestartOnGraceful: Reiniciar o servidor quando pára normalmente
